tutorial: How to Set up a New Chart

definition.text: Did you notice the three nodes automatically added to your Time Machine?

paragraphs.text: These are the scales! Anytime you add a time machine, it will come equipped with three scales (Rate, Time, and Time Frame). These are the same scales you have used to interact with charts in the Charting Space.

In another tutorial we will cover customizing these scales to achieve more complex charting setups.  But for right now it is important for you to know that your time machine needs all three to work correctly.
